Class SystemController

Object
SystemController
public class SystemController extends Object
Serve as pseudo singleton coordinate the whole system and intialise all the required service and repository

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      starts the system

    • mainMenu

      public void mainMenu()
      calls Welcome class which contain welcome page

    • handleLogin

      public void handleLogin(String userId, String password) throws AuthenticationException
      calls authentication service to validate login create and launch relevant user's controller
      Parameters:
      userId - user's ID
      password - user's password
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - if there are issue during authentication

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      saves repository and call exit page

    • update

      public void update()

    • registerRep

      public void registerRep(String userId, String name, String Password, Map<String,String> attributes) throws AuthenticationException, IllegalArgumentException
      creates new company rep object and registration request for account approval
      Parameters:
      userId - company rep email
      name - rep's name
      Password - rep's password
      attributes - rep's other attributes
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - if account exist or account still under processing
      IllegalArgumentException - if the userId have invalid email format
